name: abandoned-soldier
description: Abandoned Soldier, I guess?

name: bull
description: Moo? No, that's wrong.

name: vibe
description: Vibing

name: shadowfigureclean
description: Study of Scott Flander's Art Style

name: trace-edit
description: 1st time attempting to trace over traditional drawing and editing it digitaly

name: color-training
description: Training by using limited colour palette as well as a different style then the usual

name: death-angle
description: Was reading Solo Leveling at the time and got inspired after seeing a character featured in the series

name: demon-skull
description: Wanted to give a more diablo esk style a go with demonic skull as well as colour choice, also a lot of horns. . .

name: ghost
description: during this time I was really focusing on doing hard edge designs so to take a break from that I made this soft edged ghost

name: ghost-rider
description: A simple fan art of the popular character with a rather weird but fun to use colour palette, that was actually my first time limiting myself to such small palette

name: mecha
description: I tried doing more mechanical artwork with this one and I like the end result with the colours and shapes

name: oni-remake-box
description: Remake of one of my first artworks after I started digital art

name: pink-demon
description: Challange for this one was pink only, my eyes teared up by the end of the artwork

name: portrait-cube
description: Tried doing a self portrait of sorts but didn't feel to attached to it in the end

name: proto
description: Main idea here was black and white at the time, didn't know what to really do so a bunch of prototype esk stuff came out

name: quick-skull
description: Was blidnly going into this one, focus was just the use of a select colour palette

name: red-demon
description: Got my hands on the free trial version of affinity designer V2 so I wanted to make something quick and simple

name: robot
description: One of the rare attempts of me doing a full body character, this one I would dub a soft robot

name: s22-ultra
description: First time making a character based of a friends decription, used it as my phone wallpaper for a while

name: shadow-practice
description: This was more of a brainless sketch then a practice, but I really liked the outcome

name: skull
description: Here I tried to do a more chibi esk skull due to an artwork I saw on pinterest, didn't finish it really but this unfinished version still turned out well

name: skull-vibe
description: Very Halloween themed piece, A skull with a few horns as well

name: something
description: Tried doing something as simple as possible

name: sword-spooky
description: Another limited palette challange but this time doing an object rather then a character, very Scott Flanders inspired

name: surpass
description: While making this piece I treated it as a surpass pieace, surpass my current skill at the time and make something great

name: vector-sketching
description: After attempting to use a pen tablet I used the sketch as a base for this, still my favorite artwork even after so long

name: retro-skull
description: Tried out making something from a side profile using a limited 3 colour palette
